column4: I am running ubuntu 9.04 solely.  I am having trouble installing windows 98 (SE).  I put the CD in, selected the boot sequence to go to CD first, and no go.  It just starts up Ubuntu.
hmmm...is there a way to circumvent grub?  I wish I didn't have to get windows but there are like 2 things that need it.
I tried virtualbox but couldn't seem to load 98 from the CD
Use virtual infastructure from vmware, its free!
